General.Name: Jiangsu Changling Hydraulic Co. Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Changling Hydraulic Co., Ltd researches and develops, produces, and sells hydraulic components in China and internationally. The company offers slewing drives, central turning joints, tensioning devices, springs and valves, hydraulic central rotary joint, adjuster cylinder, pin brushing, etc. It used its products in the industry of construction machinery, mining machinery, offshore operating etc. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Jiangyin, China.

6.Name: Ms. Caihua  Li
6.Title: Chairman of the Supervisory Board & Accounting Supervisor
